abstract: But the turn against staple-financing appears to be an overreaction -- the arrangement just needs to be fully disclosed and above board.
snippet: But the turn against staple-financing appears to be an overreaction -- the arrangement just needs to be fully disclosed and above board.
lead_paragraph: Del Monte Foods and Barclays Capital will pay $89.4 million to settle allegations of wrongdoing in the sale of Del Monte to Kohlberg Kravis Roberts & Company, Vestar Capital and Centerview Partners. The settlement is one of the largest in connection with a deal on record.

headline.main: Del Monte Settlement Highlights Risk in M.&.A. Advice
